name: Cursed Kaleidoscope (Demo)
description: A young female detective is wrongly charged of the murder of her mentor. A year after her trial, she is released under the custody of senior detective Niels McLellan, and under the watchful eye of agent Alexei Nikolayev, in order to solve the Bianco household murder. However, nothing is as it seems, as the prime suspect, Lucca Bianco, has no motives for the murder. Can she solve the case, and find truth and love in a web of crime and conspiracy?
